ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: To the Brazilian agencies Conselho Nacional e Desenvolvimento Cientifico e Tecnológico (CNPq), and Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de Minas Gerais (FAPEMIG). This study was financed in part by the Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior - Brasil (CAPES) - Finance Code 001. Dr. Phillip John Villani (The University of Melbourne, Australia) revised and corrected the English language used in this manuscript.
